data.title: AppleÂ TV
data.meta_description: At the Nail Artisan of Manatee County salon in Central Florida, five diverse, hardworking manicurists try to make ends meet in a staid economy while mâ¦
data.text:
EPISODE 1

La Tirana

Desna (Niecy Nash) and her girls take pride in doing nails at the Nail Artisans of Manatee County, but amidst painting hooves and dreaming of a better life, she finds herself entangled in a money laundering scheme with the Dixie Mafia. As New Year's Eve approaches, Desna's promise of getting out and going clean is complicated when things go south with Roller (Jack Kesy), leading her and newcomer Virginia (Karrueche Tran) to take matters into their own hands, changing their lives forever.

52 min Â· Jun 11, 2017 TV-MA

EPISODE 2

Funerary

Following their entanglement with Roller (Jack Kesy), Desna (Niecy Nash) and Virginia (Karrueche Tran) desperately prepare a cover story to tell the girls and the Dixie Mafia. Meanwhile, Desna's dream salon is falling out of her grasp. Virginia suddenly goes MIA, only to return with a concocted story that sends Desna on a journey she never thought she would have to take.

47 min Â· Jun 18, 2017 TV-MA

EPISODE 3

Quicksand

As Virginia's (Karrueche Tran) lies deepen, Desna (Niecy Nash) plays catch-up covering their tracks. Desna still has a small shot at her dream salon, and with the help of her crew, she is determined to get it. Something goes awry at the clinic, putting Desna and Bryce (Kevin Rankin) in danger of Uncle Daddyâs (Dean Norris) wrath until they can figure a way out.

44 min Â· Jun 25, 2017 TV-MA

EPISODE 4

Fallout

Haunted by recent events with Roller (Jack Kesy), Desna (Niecy Nash) is doubly desperate to get out from under Uncle Daddy's (Dean Norris) thumb. Meanwhile, Bryce (Kevin Rankin) drifts deeper into the Dixie Mafia, which Jennifer (Jenn Lyon) isn't happy about. Polly (Carrie Preston) reunites with her former gold-digging "friend," while Quiet Ann (Judy Reyes) is in a lady-mess of her own. Meanwhile, Dr. Ken (Jason Antoon) finds himself in a world of trouble.

44 min Â· Jul 2, 2017 TV-MA

EPISODE 5

Bats**t

Desna (Niecy Nash) and Jennifer (Jenn Lyon) may be Dr. Ken's (Jason Antoon) only hope, as Bryce (Kevin Rankin) wrongly accuses him of a heinous crime. Dean (Harold Perrineau) sees a disturbing billboard ad that hits too close to home, leaving Desna to cope with the dark aftermath. Meanwhile, Virginia (Karrueche Tran) and Desna are forced to go to Polly (Carrie Preston) for help to rid the world of two horrible birds from Desna's past, with one well-aimed stone.

44 min Â· Jul 9, 2017 TV-MA

EPISODE 6

Self Portrait

All of our girls go to their new fancy salon for the first time. They aren't met with the kindness of strangers. Desna (Niecy Nash) and crew decide to compete in Florida's premiere nail design competition for a big cash prize. Feeling left out of the crew, Virginia (Karrueche Tran) does something shocking to get some of life's finer things. Jennifer (Jenn Lyon) finds out an agonizing secret of Desna's that may destroy their friendship forever.

46 min Â· Jul 16, 2017 TV-MA
